statements: SELECT * FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, amount, payment_status FROM transactions
SELECT payment_method, amount, order_id FROM transactions
SELECT transaction_id, order_id, amount, payment_status, payment_method FROM transactions
SELECT payment_status, transaction_id, amount FROM transactions
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_status='pending';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE payment_method='credit';
SELECT order_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE payment_method='paypal' AND amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, payment_status FROM transactions WHERE payment_status='completed' OR payment_status='failed' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 50.00 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM orders JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payments.payment_amount < 100.00;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_id = 100;
SELECT payment_id, order_id, payment_date, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT DISTINCT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 2;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM payments WHERE amount_paid >= 1000 ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(order_id) > 3;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders JOIN payments ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE amount_paid >= 5000 ORDER BY customer_id, order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND product_name LIKE '%T-shirt%' ORDER BY product_name;
SELECT order_id, payment_date, amount_paid FROM payments JOIN orders ON orders.order_id = payments.order_id WHERE payment_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY payment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_item_id, product_id, quantity FROM order_items ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT order_id, payment_amount FROM payments WHERE payment_amount < 500;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT order_id, order_date, customer_name FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, count(order_id) as order_count FROM customers LEFT JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id GROUP BY customer_name, email;

SELECT order_items.quantity, order_items.price, products.product_name FROM order_items JOIN products ON order_items.product_id = products.product_id WHERE order_items.quantity * order_items.price > 50;
SELECT * FROM Orders;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT name, price FROM Products WHERE stock_quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, name, email FROM Customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT order_id, payment_date, total_amount FROM Payments ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE order_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT c.name, p.name, oi.quantity FROM Customers c JOIN Orders o ON c.customer_id = o.customer_id JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id;
SELECT p.name, p.price, oi.quantity, (p.price * oi.quantity) AS total_price FROM Products p JOIN OrderItems oi ON p.product_id = oi.product_id ORDER BY total_price DESC;

SELECT o.order_id, SUM(p.price * oi.quantity) AS total_order_amount FROM Orders o JOIN OrderItems oi ON o.order_id = oi.order_id JOIN Products p ON oi.product_id = p.product_id GROUP BY o.order_id HAVING total_order_amount > 1000;
